constraints.name: xor_sum_zero
constraints.description: 所有边权重的异或和必须为0

constraints.name: min_spanning_tree_weight_minimization
constraints.description: 最小生成树的权重和需要尽可能小

constraints.name: complete_graph
constraints.description: 图是完全图，包含所有可能的边

constraints.name: non_negative_weights
constraints.description: 未赋权的边需要被赋予非负权重
